references: Related: CF 268320. Amending: Ord 78444. Repealing: Ord 91594.
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Employees' Retirement System and amending Sections 2(m), 7, 13(c), 14(c), 14(f), 14(h), 16(a) and 16(b) of Ordinance 78444, adding a new Section 19(c) thereto, and repealing Ordinance 91594 and Section 14-i of Ordinance 78444, to increase certain City Employees' Retirement System benefits as of January 1, 1971.
